description:
If you love sweet heat, this jerky is for you. Pairing the bright sweetness of honey with subtle fire of Sriracha Two Rivers has created a crave worthy snack. Two Rivers lets their grass-fed Canadian beef and perfected spice blends speak for themselves, curing their jerky with the minimum amount of processing.

  • Ingredients: grass-fed and finished Canadian beef, sugars (cane sugar, brown sugar, honey), salt, spices, natural flavour (baker’s yeast extract, salt, natural flavour), dehydrated garlic, natural honey essence, spice extract, smoke
  • Beef is sourced from farms in BC and Alberta, and is free of hormones and antibiotics
  • No nitrites added, just smoke and time
name: Two Rivers Honey Sriracha Beef Jerky
